content.title: Web Developer
content.description: Designed and devloped mobile-first, responsive web sites for individual clients and small companies for an hourly rate, utilizing LAMP/Wordpress and MEAN frameworks.

content.title: Front-End Developer
content.description: Developed and maintained the About.com legacy front-end code base, optimizing for performance on desktop and mobile. Eventually transitioned to maintaining and extending the current front-end platform, including template design and module creation.

content.title: Web Developer
content.description: Designed and devloped mobile-first, responsive web sites for individual clients and small companies for an hourly rate, utilizing LAMP/Wordpress and MEAN frameworks.

content.title: Web Marketing Developer
content.description: Developed landing pages and mini-sites for marketing campaigns using PHP/WordPress, authored marketing and sales analytics reports, oversaw pay-per-click and display ad campaigns, SEO, and composed, filmed, and edited marketing promotional videos.

content.title: Video Marketing Intern
content.description: Created specialized informational and promotional video content for use in web marketing campaigns.

content.title: Content Editor
content.description: Responsible for contributing daily content and planning growth and development through content marketing and social media.

content.title: Fundraising Ambassador
content.description: Raised over $60,000 in alumni/corporate contributions by speaking to over 30 prospective donors on a daily basis, while honing valuable sales and cold-calling skills.
